mutants.code:
import re

def count_word_occurrences(word, text):
    text = re.sub('', '', text)
    text = re.sub('\\([^)]*\\)', '', text)
    pattern = f'\\b{word}\\b'
    occurrences = re.findall(pattern, text, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return len(occurrences)

import re

def count_word_occurrences(word, text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', text)
    text = re.sub('\\([^)]*\\)', '', text)
    pattern = f'\\b{word}\\b'
    occurrences = re.findall(pattern, text, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return len(occurrences)

import re

def count_word_occurrences(word, text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text)
    text = re.sub('\\([^)]*\\)', '', text)
    pattern = f'\\b{word}'
    occurrences = re.findall(pattern, text, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return len(occurrences)
